ctx: assert (Hl: getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet j l)).
exceptions.tactic: apply (rely_loc' j cn l i); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i, j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) The term "j" has type "state" while it is expected to have type "Ordered.sort Label".

original: assert (Hl: getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet j l)). { apply (rely_loc' j cn l i); auto. } rewrite (cohStC _ pf _ Hl). rewrite (cohStC _ pf' _ Hl). reflexivity.
